name: CAGE
description: With lightning-fast gameplay fully exploiting all three dimensions of motion, CAGE is a shooter unlike any other. The "tether" allows for unprecedented freedom and agility of movement, creating explosive action.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1 GHz Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: 1 GB or higher DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space Sound Card: DirectXÂ® 9.0c compatible 16-bit sound card and latest drivers

reviews.review_text: This game is SUPER fun to play. Flinging yourself around the map without a care in the world- except for killing your friends. The many weapons add diversity and strategy, and overall the game is a blast. I load it up sometimes just to fly around on my own. It's got a good feeling to it, something many games today lack.
